statements: SELECT * FROM premium_courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, price FROM premium_courses WHERE price > 50;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM premium_courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM premium_courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, price FROM premium_courses ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM premium_courses WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, price FROM premium_courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT course_name, price FROM premium_courses WHERE price < 50 OR price > 200 ORDER BY price DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, price FROM premium_courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'A%' OR course_name LIKE '%B' ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT course_name, price FROM premium_courses WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY price DESC, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM premium_courses;
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM premium_courses WHERE course_price > 100;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM premium_courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Python%';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 'c16aacc7-49b9-4cb6-8b37-1061df146d8e' ORDER BY subscription_start_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_type, subscription_plan FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM premium_courses WHERE course_price > 50 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'monthly' AND subscription_plan = 'premium' ORDER BY subscription_start_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_price FROM premium_courses ORDER BY course_price DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_price, course_description FROM premium_courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%advanced%' OR course_description LIKE '%expert%';

SELECT subscription_type, subscription_plan, COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM subscriptions GROUP BY subscription_type, subscription_plan HAVING total_subscriptions > 10 ORDER BY total_subscriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumCourses;
SELECT course_name, price FROM PremiumCourses ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM PremiumCourses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT subscriber_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumCourses WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, price FROM PremiumCourses WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'John%' AND price < 500;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM PremiumCourses GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT pc.course_name, pc.instructor_name, p.amount FROM PremiumCourses pc INNER JOIN Payments p ON pc.course_id = p.subscription_id WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT s.*, pc.course_name, pc.price FROM Subscriptions s LEFT JOIN PremiumCourses pc ON s.subscriber_id = pc.course_id WHERE s.start_date <= '2022-01-31' AND s.end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM courses WHERE course_price > 100;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT subscription_name, subscription_price, subscription_duration FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_duration = 12;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM courses WHERE course_price > 100;
SELECT users.user_name, payments.payment_amount, payments.payment_date FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT subscription_name, subscription_price, subscription_duration FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM courses WHERE course_price > 100
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id ASC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_price > 1000 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_price FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_price < 500 ORDER BY course_price ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.course_name, uc.enrollment_date FROM users u JOIN user_courses uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = uc.course_id WHERE uc.enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
